speaker: agent
text: For an update on an existing [ORGANIZATION] order for new service for your home or business.

speaker: agent
text: For an update on an existing order for your home [OCCUPATION] [OCCUPATION].

speaker: customer
text: [PERSON_NAME], we have a garage door that needs two new pieces of glass, like up where the windows are.

speaker: agent
text: And I was just curious if you guys do replacement glass for garage doors.

speaker: agent
text: It is a two trip process because it is required to be tempered safety glass.

speaker: agent
text: Okay, can you give me like, any, like, rough.

speaker: customer
text: So I'm trying to decide, like, if it'worth it to replace the glass.

speaker: agent
text: So I'm trying to figure out if it's worth it to replace the whole door or the glass.

speaker: customer
text: Can you give me, like, if I tell you roughly what size is?

speaker: customer
text: Yeah, just tell me what the size of glass is and I'll definitely give you ale.

speaker: agent
text: Okay, let's just measure it at like, let's just say it's about 10 inches tall by about 30 inches wide.

speaker: customer
text: And then is it a double pane unit or a single pane of glass?

speaker: agent
text: It's a single pane kind of like held in place.

speaker: customer
text: There's like kind of like a.

speaker: customer
text: Like a decorative thing on the front of the door.

speaker: customer
text: And then it has just like a. I don't know, it's almost like a lip, like around on the inside of the door.

speaker: agent
text: I would say you're looking at right around [MONEY_AMOUNT] for two of them.

speaker: agent
text: Is that with installation and stuff too?

speaker: customer
text: So, yeah, if we decide to do something like this, do they need to come out and measure ahead of time or do they just come with the grass and they do.

speaker: agent
text: And then is there a service call or anything like that?

speaker: customer
text: No, there's no charge for that.

speaker: agent
text: I did start an order for you, so if you'd like to get scheduled, it's all in the system under your phone number.

speaker: agent
text: But they measure like, so they'd come out of measure ahead of time then?

speaker: agent
text: They come out, confirm glass size, installation conditions, etc.

speaker: customer
text: And then from there we'll get the glass order and then we come back out to get it installed.

speaker: agent
text: All right, have a good day.
